api_list.name: getUsers
api_list.description: return a list of all users

optional_parameters.name: age

api_list.name: getUser
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nbzor-homework-v1.p.rapidapi.com/api/users/0"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nbzor-homework-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://nbzor-homework-v1.p.rapidapi.com/api/users/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nbzor-homework-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
